workflow.name: Smart email triage with Gmail, GPT-4, Slack and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## Description
This workflow intelligently analyzes incoming Gmail emails, classifies intent using GPT-4, and sends real-time Slack notifications while logging structured data into Google Sheets. It provides a smart, AI-assisted communication workflow that saves time and ensures no important email is overlooked. ü§ñüíåüìä

## What This Template Does
- Monitors Gmail for unread or new incoming emails. üì•
- Extracts sender, subject, and body content for processing. ‚úâÔ∏è
- Uses GPT-4 to analyze email intent and determine priority. üß†
- Formats key insights (sender, summary, intent, urgency). üßæ
- Posts structured summaries and priority alerts in Slack. üí¨
- Logs all processed emails with classification results in Google Sheets. üìä
- Sends error notifications in case of API or parsing failures. üö®

## Key Benefits
‚úÖ AI-driven email intent classification for smarter response handling.
 ‚úÖ Seamless Slack notifications for high-priority or urgent emails.
 ‚úÖ Maintains a centralized record of email insights in Google Sheets.
 ‚úÖ Reduces response time by surfacing critical messages instantly.
 ‚úÖ Minimizes manual email triage and improves team productivity.

## Features
- Real-time Gmail monitoring for unread emails.
- AI-based classification using GPT-4.
- Slack notifications with rich formatting and urgency tagging.
- Google Sheets logging for tracking and analytics.
- Built-in error handling with notification alerts.
- Modular setup for easy credential reuse across projects.

## Requirements
- Gmail OAuth2 credentials with inbox read access.
- Slack Bot token with chat:write and channels:history scopes.
- Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials for data logging.
- Azure OpenAI (or OpenAI GPT-4) API credentials.
- n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted).

## Target Audience
- Customer support teams managing shared inboxes.
- Operations teams tracking email-based requests.
- Sales or marketing teams prioritizing inbound leads.
- AI automation enthusiasts optimizing email workflows.
- Remote teams using Slack for real-time updates.

## Step-by-Step Setup Instructions
- Connect your Gmail, Slack, Google Sheets, and GPT-4 credentials in n8n. üîë
- Specify the Gmail search filter (e.g., is:unread) for tracking new emails. üì¨
- Add your Slack channel ID in the notification node. üí¨
- Set your Google Sheet ID and tab name for logging results. üìä
- Run once manually to verify connection and output structure. ‚úÖ
- Enable the workflow for continuous, real-time execution. üöÄ

workflow.name: AI-Powered Email Triage from Gmail to Slack and Sheets

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "summary": "string",
  "callToAction": "Reply Needed | Review Attachment | For Your Information",
  "insights": "string",
  "links": ["string"],
  "attachments": ["string"]
}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI email assistant. Analyze the provided email content (subject, body text, HTML, and links) and return a structured JSON with the following fields:

- summary: A concise plain text summary of the email.
- callToAction: Choose one of ["Reply Needed", "Review Attachment", "For Your Information"] based on the email‚Äôs intent.
- insights: Key points, deadlines, or important notes mentioned in the email.
- links: Extract all valid links from the email content. If none are present, return an empty array [].
- attachments: If attachments are mentioned in the text, list them as ["PDF", "Excel", "Word"] or return [].

Always respond with valid JSON only.

parameters.content:
## üîß Extract Email Data
Processes raw Gmail data and extracts key information.

**Details:**
- Extracts sender, subject, body text/HTML
- Identifies and extracts all links from email content
- Advanced attachment detection using multiple methods
- Checks for attachment keywords in email text
- Prepares clean data structure for AI analysis

## üìß Gmail Trigger
Monitors your **Gmail inbox** for new incoming emails.

**Details:**
- Polls Gmail every minute for new messages
- Uses OAuth2 authentication
- Triggers the workflow when new emails arrive
- Provides raw email data to the next node.

## üéØ AI Agent
Core AI engine that analyzes email content and generates insights.

**Details:**
- Analyzes subject, body text, HTML, and links
- Categorizes emails by urgency and action required
- Extracts key insights, deadlines, and important notes
- Uses structured output parser for consistent JSON responses
- Connected to OpenAI model and memory for context

## ‚è≠Ô∏è Skip Attachments
Bypass attachment processing for emails without attachments.

**Details:**
- Sets empty processedAttachments array
- Uses only email body content for analysis
- Maintains data structure consistency
- Flags attachment processing as complete

## üìé Process Attachments
Analyzes and processes email attachments when present.

**Details:**
- Identifies attachment types (text, PDF, Word)
- Extracts metadata (filename, size, content type)
- Combines attachment info with email content
- Prepares enhanced content for AI analysis
- Limits combined content to 4000 characters

## ‚ùì Check Attachments
Decision node that routes emails based on attachment presence.

**Details:**
- Evaluates if email has attachments
- Routes to 'Process Attachments' if attachments found
- Routes to 'Skip Attachments' if no attachments
- Uses boolean logic for attachment detection

## üîß Format Data for Sheets
Prepares and formats data for Google Sheets logging.

**Details:**
- Extracts essential information from Slack messages
- Parses sender, subject, AI summary, and action required
- Determines which Slack channel was used
- Creates clean, structured data for spreadsheet
- Limits text fields to appropriate lengths for sheets

## üìé Slack Attachments
Sends attachment email notifications to review channel.

**Details:**
- Posts to #review-needed channel
- Includes attachment indicator emoji
- Shows extracted links from email
- Provides AI summary and insights
- Prompts for attachment review action

## üö® Slack Urgent
Sends urgent email notifications to priority Slack channel.

**Details:**
- Posts to #reply-needed channel
- Includes sender, subject, AI summary
- Highlights urgent nature with emoji
- Contains action required and insights
- Formatted for immediate attention

## üìé Slack Attachments
Sends attachment email notifications to review channel.

**Details:**
- Posts to #review-needed channel
- Includes attachment indicator emoji
- Shows extracted links from email
- Provides AI summary and insights
- Prompts for attachment review action

## üìé Route Attachments
Routes emails with attachments that need review.

**Details:**
- Checks if callToAction equals 'Review Attachment'
- Sends attachment emails to dedicated Slack channel
- Routes informational emails to general channel
- Second-level priority routing decision

## üö® Route Urgent
Routes urgent emails that require immediate reply.

**Details:**
- Checks if callToAction equals 'Reply Needed'
- Sends urgent emails to dedicated Slack channel
- Routes non-urgent emails to attachment check
- First-level priority routing decision

## üß† Parse AI Response
Processes and validates AI analysis results.

**Details:**
- Handles multiple AI response formats
- Extracts summary, callToAction, and insights
- Validates callToAction values (Reply Needed, Review Attachment, For Your Information)
- Provides fallback data if AI parsing fails
- Combines AI results with original email data

## üìä Log to Google Sheets
Records all processed emails in a Google Sheets database.

**Details:**
- Appends/updates email data in centralized spreadsheet
- Maintains historical record of all processed emails
- Uses OAuth2 authentication with Google Sheets API
- Auto-maps input data to sheet columns
- Provides audit trail and analytics capability

## ü§ñ Azure OpenAI Chat Model
Provides GPT-4o AI model for email analysis.

**Details:**
- Uses Azure OpenAI GPT-4o model
- Processes email content for intelligent analysis
- Generates structured responses
- Connected to output parser for formatting

## üß† Simple Memory
Provides conversation memory for AI agent consistency.

**Details:**
- Maintains context across email analyses
- Uses 7-message sliding window
- Custom session key for email processing
- Helps AI learn patterns and improve responses

## üèóÔ∏è Structured Output Parser
Defines the expected JSON structure for AI responses.

**Details:**
- Enforces consistent AI output format
- Specifies required fields (summary, callToAction, insights)
- Validates callToAction options
- Ensures structured data for downstream processing

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
